sections.blerb:
Building the tools that fuel open innovation.

From the ProLinux™ series, to smart hardware, to Sineware Labs experiments, Sineware builds products that pushes the boundaries of free and open tech.

🍁 We are a team based in Waterloo, Ontario, Canada (ﾉ◕ヮ◕)ﾉ*:･ﾟ✧
sections.grid_right: Discord Community
sections.grid_left:
ProLinux Server is an immutable, deterministic, container-driven operating system.

Sineware PLS runs from a read-only and verified boot image, and runs every application in its own container environment. Isolated, secure, and an app environment that’s always predictable.

View the development progress on GitHub!

The Sineware Unified API provides services from a simple configuration interface for ProLinux, to custom firmware for embedded IoT chips, bringing edge compute capability to ProLinux applications.

ProLinux Phone OS brings the ProLinux core technologies of immutability and isolation to graphical mobile devices. Built on KDE Plasma Mobile, ProLinux Phone OS excels where traditional desktop-focused distributions fall short.

Apps live in their own containers, providing a simple update mechanism that also means apps always run in their own tested environment. The Sineware KDE Frameworks Base Image is a unified container image that is shared between apps, leading to a smaller app footprint.

Stay tuned!
